author: Kyle Mantyla
title: Ted Cruz Welcomes The Endorsement Of Anti-Gay Hate Group Official And Radio Host Sandy Rios
text:
On Friday, Ted Cruz 's presidential campaign proudly announced that it had received the endorsement of Sandy Rios, a radio host and director of governmental affairs for the anti-gay hate group the American Family Association .
Along with endorsements from Lori Roma, the former executive director of the American Legislative Exchange Council, and Susan Carleson, the Chairman and CEO of the American Civil Rights Union, Cruz welcomed Rios' endorsement :
“I am thrilled to have the support of three of the conservative movement’s strongest voices for families, religious liberty and the unborn,” said Sen. Cruz. “We are running an aggressive grassroots campaign and their help engaging and motivating conservative voters gives our effort a great advantage.”
Sandy Rios is the Director of Governmental Affairs for the American Family Association, one of America’s largest, pro-family grassroots organizations, and host of “Sandy Rios in the Morning on AFR Talk” which can be heard on nearly 200 stations through the American Family Radio Network.
In her capacity as a radio host for the AFA, Rios has repeatedly attacked gays, Muslims and Jews while promoting conspiracy theories and issuing repeated warnings that God 's judgment will soon fall upon this nation:
Sandy Rios: Gay Rainbows Increase Terrorism Threat For America. Sandy Rios Predicts Major Worldwide Disaster In Divine Punishment For Gay Marriage . Religious Right Activists: God Will Punish America For Gay Marriage . Anti-Gay Pundit: Homosexuality 'A Factor' In Amtrak Crash . Sandy Rios: 'You Must Prepare For Martyrdom' If Gay Marriage Becomes Legal . Sandy Rios: Children are 'Sexually Abused' by 'Homosexual Advocacy' in Schools . Rios Claims Gay Men Are Child Predators by Nature . Sandy Rios: Child Abuse is tied to 'Homosexual Recruitment' . Sandy Rios Says Secular Jews Have Been 'The Worst Enemies of the Country' . Sandy Rios Goes Birther, Claims Obama Is 'Not That Offended When Americans Are Killed' . Rios: 'There are Tons of People in Government' who are Communists . Sandy Rios: Migrant Kids Spread Disease Because They Don't Know 'How To Go To The Bathroom Properly'' . Sandy Rios: Obama Is 'Working Against' The American People 'To Favor The Islamists' . Sandy Rios: Muslims 'Colonizing' Texas And Tennessee . Sandy Rios: House Should Expel Muslim Congressman For 'Islamic Terrorist Connections' . Sandy Rios Explains God Will Allow More Terrorist Attacks Against America Because He's A 'Gentleman' . Sandy Rios Warns Of New Terrorist Attacks Because Boston Mourners 'Ignored' God . Rios: 'God Will Even the Score' with Obama and Gays .
